channel.title: Mr. Quarter's up to his old tricks agen
channel.description: Yep he's been nulling me for the past hour.....Any ideas how to block him he's gettin old...

item.title: Mr. Quarter's up to his old tricks agen
item.dc:creator: @hippie hippie
item.description:
@hippie wrote:

I have asked him.
First

I was just testing my program thats all
Then:
I needed to teach people how vunerable their servers are
Then he said he isnt doing it anymore. But, I do beleive he is, becuase he was banned. He also released his crasher(s) Me and Aff talked. He has two. a client based crasher, and the server status leecher.

Read full topic

item.title: Mr. Quarter's up to his old tricks agen
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

Appearantly, MrQuarter has become another SYI, he has been banned from MoparScape, and there is nothing more to do than ban his IP. Have you confronted him and asked why he is doing this? Maybe that is something you should think about before you come posting it here, it creates more spam than needed, most of us don’t care, deal with him yourself.

item.title: Mr. Quarter's up to his old tricks agen
item.dc:creator: @itzkyle Lusfr
item.description:
@itzkyle wrote:

[quote=“hippie, post:33, topic:149878”][quote author=zoltanman link=topic=205337.msg1809170#msg1809170 date=1191801988]
This just shows how immature Mrquater is.
[/quote]

He is immature, and ty for posting that, if people werent immature jackasses we wouldnt NEED to try and bulk up server defenced for DDos attacks.

Tell you the truth if ppl cant block him they need to learn some java. cause it’s an easy fix.

You really can’t say that, 20% of this comunuty knows java.
People shouldnt have to try and stop ddos attacks.

If your so smart, maybe post a tutorial, or try and teach people what to do.
If you’re to stuck up to do that, then dont say you have the fix. Especialy since, no server is uncrashable.[/quote]

he crashed me once. then i fixed it to where he cant do anything. yes, i know my server is crashable , but when someone crashes it i fix the exploit they used. and ill try to make a tut (never made a tut before)

Read full topic

item.title: Mr. Quarter's up to his old tricks agen
item.dc:creator: @slay_blad3 slay blad3
item.description:
@slay_blad3 wrote:

[quote=“slay blad3, post:19, topic:149878”][quote author=xx qwertyuiop xx link=topic=204995.msg1808708#msg1808708 date=1191793147]
I came up with a solution. in server.java, search for

if (found < 3)

and change it to

if (found < 3 && !connectingHost.startsWith("user-0c6s0lh.cable.mindspring.com"))

[/quote]

1.) His IP changes every few mins

If what both of them say is true, you should change startswith to contains & just mindspring instead of the whole IP. If someone does it from another ISP, add it too.

But that will only work if what they said is true, I have no idea if it is.[/quote]

Does anyone know if that works?

Read full topic

item.title: Mr. Quarter's up to his old tricks agen
item.dc:creator: @xdarklight.x xdarklight.x
item.description:
@xdarklight.x wrote:

[quote=“hippie, post:17, topic:149878”]It’s been deleted.[quote author=Aff link=topic=205337.msg1808926#msg1808926 date=1191797351]
To be honest, this is a pointless thread. There is no way to make a server uncrashable. Even if you find a way to block his client he’ll still be able to find a way to crash your servers. Your best choices are…

Just be nice to him and hope he doesn’t go evil on you
»Block his clients, over and over again.
Ignore it
»Don’t post it on the Moparscape status page, because it connects to there.
[/quote]

HE DOESNT USE A CLIENT TIM

These threads are annoying me now.

SPAM
Wrong Section

Reported

If you give it a while, maybe the people of this comunity will come togeather and make a legit code for preventing ddos attacks.

No server is uncrashable, but it can still be prevented in many ways.

Let the people come togeather, FFS![/quote]

Yes I agree with hippie

Read full topic
